info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 3:25PM EDT until June 06 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Albany County in east central New York... Southeastern Saratoga County in east central New York... Northwestern Rensselaer County in east central New York... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 324 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mechanicville, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Troy, Clifton Park, Cohoes, Watervliet, Mechanicville, Latham, Menands, Green Island, Waterford, Loudonville, Center Brunswick, Country Knolls, Halfmoon, Brunswick, Stillwater, Schaghticoke, Valley Falls, South Troy, Schaghticoke Hill and Willow Glen. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
